sprint_goal: Establish the core calculator UI, basic arithmetic, session-based history, and responsive layout to create a functional, usable MVP for anonymous users.
Implement the full user authentication lifecycle (Registration & Login) and add core scientific functionality (Trig modes) to prepare for personalized features.
Deliver the first wave of personalized features by enabling persistence for history and custom modes, and launch the first specialized electronics tool (Ohm's Law).
Launch the flagship user-extensible feature by building the custom mode creation wizard and the secure execution engine, allowing users to create and run their own tools.
Enhance application resilience and support by implementing robust offline data synchronization and launching the in-app help system.
